column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Visiting from southern California
column2: we picked this restaurant for breakfast on a very busy Saturday morning.  Aside from the over an hour and half wait for being seated which was rather testing
column4: the service was in par with what was expected
column5: and if crowded and noisy atmospheres are not of a concern
column6: you would be well served here.  Of note was the unique cinnamon (roll) pancake which I highly recommend.
